azurerm_data_factory_linked_service_sql_.description: Manages a Linked Service (connection) between a SQL Server and Azure Data Factory.

name.description: Specifies the name of the Data Factory Linked Service SQL Server. Changing this forces a new resource to be created. Must be globally unique. See the [Microsoft documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/data-factory/naming-rules

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Data Factory Linked Service SQL Server. Changing this forces a new resource

data_factory_name.description: The Data Factory name in which to associate the Linked Service with. Changing this forces a new resource.

connection_string.description: The connection string in which to authenticate with the SQL Server.

description.description: The description for the Data Factory Linked Service SQL Server.

integration_runtime_name.description: The integration runtime reference to associate with the Data Factory Linked Service SQL Server.

annotations.description: List of tags that can be used for describing the Data Factory Linked Service SQL Server.

parameters.description: A map of parameters to associate with the Data Factory Linked Service SQL Server.

additional_properties.description: A map of additional properties to associate with the Data Factory Linked Service SQL Server.

id.description: The ID of the Data Factory SQL Server Linked Service.

create.description: Used when creating the Data Factory SQL Server Linked Service.

update.description: Used when updating the Data Factory SQL Server Linked Service.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Data Factory SQL Server Linked Service.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Data Factory SQL Server Linked Service.
